messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Deep Ultrameens Construct 4? Deep Ultrameens Construct 4! Deep Ultrameens Construct 4!!!!!!!!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Our intern accidentally wiped the database, so your station needs a new name: Meta Factory Beta.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Due to recent corporate acquisitions, the station has been rebranded to Control Crypt Lima.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Kobe Dryfus made us change the station name, which is now Widdershins Space Junk XVI.
